title: Finance Ministry-IMF discussions set to begin tomorrow (9)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Further discussions between the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and local representatives are set to begin tomorrow (09).
The Finance Ministry stated that the discussions, scheduled to be held online, will be held from tomorrow until the 23rd of May.
Finance Minister, President’s Counsel Ali Sabry, alongside a delegation of senior officials of the Central Bank are due to join the discussions.
Chemicals contained in tear gas carry significant health risks, warns SLMA
